modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ductwork: A simple yet powerful item transfer mod.
text.autoconfig.ductwork.title: Ductwork Configuration
Limit Ductworkings to Vanilla parity feature set?
* Disallow upward item transfers
* Limit Collectors to downward intake
* Players cannot toggle Damper state
Server overrides client; new placement only.
text.autoconfig.ductwork.option.placemen:
Special Duct-on-Duct placement mode?
Using a Ductwork item on a Ductwork block will
place the block item instead of opening the inventory.
Use less Iron in Ductwork recipes?
Convenient for iron farm nerfing modpacks.
